title: Latest statement in response to small boat crossings

content.text: "Our priority is to stop the boats, which is why we have taken robust action to crackdown on vile people smuggling gangs, deter migrants from making dangerous crossings and, alongside our French counterparts, intercept vessels.

"This relentless action has seen crossings fall by 36% in the last year. More than 26,000 of these dangerous, illegal and unnecessary crossing attempts were prevented in 2023 thanks to our partnership with France.
“The tragic loss of life in the Channel last year is another stark reminder of why we must disrupt the gangs driving this evil trade. Our thoughts remain with those involved and their families."
